resources.string: Swing by Swing SmartWatch Service
This is the configuration text
Swing by Swing
Preferences
Swing by Swing Settings
Swing by Swing Settings
Configure Swing by Swing by opening the Swing by Swing app. Go to Settings for all options.
CONFIGURATION
Swing by Swing Golf is required on your mobile device. Install from the Google Play Store.
Go to Application Settings -> Accessories -> SmartWatch 2, and make sure it is set to ON, then press Save.
Start a round, distance and score info should be sent to your watch for easy access.
Still not receiving in-round info? Go to Smart Connect and make sure your watch is properly connected.
GETTING STARTED
Search for a course on your mobile device and start a round at that course.
Select the players and scorecard type you wish to use. Then press "Start Round."
Distance and score info will show on your watch and be synced to your mobile device.
Looper members can record shots and track distances with their clubs.
DISTANCES
Press HOLE NUMBER button to bring up a list of holes or enter score.
Press the middle DISTANCE button to wake GPS.
Press the bottom SHOT DISTANCE button to start or end a shot.
SCORECARD
If you have a scorecard configured, you will see current totals for all players.
To change between score, and points, use the OPTIONS button in the top right.
CLUB TRACKER
A list of recorded shots will be displayed for the current round.
Non Looper members will be able to track their current shot, but not record their shots.
